problem: 如图,某校数学兴趣小组在大厦前的平地上C处,测得大厦顶端A的仰角∠ACB=30°,在D处测得大厦顶端A的仰角∠ADB=45°,那么从点A观察C、D处的视角∠CAD的度数为()
comment: 此题考查了仰角的定义以及三角形外角的性质．注意由图得到∠ADB是△ACD的外角是解此题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the math interest group of a school is on the flat ground in front of the building at C, and measured the elevation angle of the top of the building A ∠ACB = N_0, and measured the elevation angle of the top A of the building at D ∠ADB = N_1, then the degree of ∠CAD from the point of view of point A to C and D is ()
